## TextureLoader.load() method

Load an image from url and create a texture

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
load(url: string, requestHeaders?: RequestHeaders | undefined, crossOrigin?: boolean): Promise<THREE.Texture>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | URL to the image |
|  requestHeaders | [RequestHeaders](./harp-mapview.requestheaders.md) \| undefined | Optional request headers to load image(e.g. Authorization) |
|  crossOrigin | boolean | Enable/disable CORS |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;THREE.Texture&gt;
